vote.title:
Authorize an increase in the construction services contract with A & B Construction, LLC to (1) extend the contract term from November 22, 2025 to November 22, 2026; (2) add necessary new construction items; and (3) provide façade renovations for the Mockingbird Pedestrian Bridge - Not to exceed $1,268,499.18, from $14,839,500.00 to $16,107,999.18 - Financing: Street and Alley Improvement Fund ($520,295.18), Park and Recreation Facilities Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Funds ($732,877.60) and University Crossing PID Trail Fund ($15,326.40)

*In alignment with  Infrastructure Improvements.
vote.description:
